user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, well-fitting clothing that is affordable and versatile for different occasions.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and flattering plus-size shirt that I could wear in various settings. However, the product did not meet my expectations in terms of length, which was disappointing given the long wait for delivery.
I needed a budget-friendly option that would fit well and be comfortable. The positive reviews and the low price were significant factors in my decision to purchase this item.
I was searching for a soft and comfortable tee that would fit well and be versatile for layering. The great price and positive feedback influenced my decision to buy this product.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, support, and practicality. I value items that are made from soft, breathable materials and have features that enhance usability, such as pockets in clothing or adjustable fits. I appreciate when products are designed with a focus on ease of wear, like elasticized waistbands and tag-free finishes. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that are overly complicated or uncomfortable, such as bras with excessive material or sweatpants without pockets. I also have a low tolerance for items that do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and quality, especially if they are not worth the price.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Comfort Colors Adult Short Sleeve Tee, Style 1717> / Item ID: B0BYFWLJXV / Price: $9.81 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ["Wish every day could feel like a laid-back Saturday morning? Just pull on the Comfort Colors 1717 adult tee. The hearty jersey fabric is knitted of the softest 100% cotton that's ring spun, then garment washed to achieve the comfort of a tee that's been washed 50 times. Plus, you can choose from a rich color palette that's as varied as nature itself. So your tee can match your mood, your message and your lifestyle."]
